system.descriptionText: Character makes -10 Command Test with +10 for each of their Comrades in Cohesion that participate in the Order. If Successful, Until the end of their Turn the character cannot be targeted by Melee Attacks whilst making a Charge Action and for each Degree of Success they inflict one additional hit on the target of the Charge Action with a melee weapon wielded by one of more of their Comrades.
